Reviews.Title: not exceeded my expectations (no supero mis espectativas)
Reviews.Author: Erik Paravisini
Reviews.Content: 1.-the battery was damaged. (bateria dañada)2.-the phone was locked.  (telefono estaba bloqueado)3.-the data cable was wrong.  (cable de datos incorrecto)4.-after, they sent me a code incorrect to unlocked my phone. (me enviaron un codigo de desbloqueo incorrecto)5.-I lost long time with this problem  (perdi mucho tiempo con este problema)

ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Curve 9300 2MP, Qwerty Keyboard, (3G 850MHz AT&T) Unlocked World Mobile Phone (Black)
